prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Reed, Piano, Drums, Brass, Bass, but without Guitar.
captions:
Style 1: Reed, Piano, Drums, Brass, and Bass are the instruments featured in this song, but no Guitar.

Style 2: This song is composed of Reed, Piano, Drums, Brass, and Bass, but no Guitar.

Style 3: This composition is made up of Reed, Piano, Drums, Brass, and Bass, omitting the Guitar.
